Class EventAdmin

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cvut.fel.dbs.smartorchestra.model.EventAdmin

  • public class EventAdmin
extends Object
    This class represents a model for manipulating with Events and Participants
    Author:
    Matěj Bartoň (bartom47@fel.cvut.cz)

      • loadEvents

        public List<Events> loadEvents(EventDateFilter filter)
                        throws Exception
        Loads events which undergo the filter condition given for date value of now.
        Parameters:
        filter - - a enum EventDateFilter value
        Returns:
        List of Events entities
        Throws:
        Exception - when the operation fails

      • loadEvents

        public List<Events> loadEvents(EventDateFilter filter,
                               Date date)
                        throws Exception
        Loads events which undergo the filter condition compared to the date given.
        Parameters:
        filter - - a enum EventDateFilter value
        date - - a Date object
        Returns:
        List of Events entities
        Throws:
        Exception - when the operation fails

      • sendInvitations

        public void sendInvitations(Events event,
                            HashMap<Sections,JCheckBox> eventSections,
                            SectionType type)
        Sends the invitation to players based on the checked checkbox stored in the hash map.
        Parameters:
        event - - a Events entity
        eventSections - - HashMap where Sections entity is the key an JCheckBox object the value
        type - - an enum value of SectionType

      • getInvitedSectionsForEvent

        public List<Sections> getInvitedSectionsForEvent(Events event)
                                          throws EventAdminException
        Reads invited section for Events entity given.
        Parameters:
        event - - an Events entity
        Returns:
        - List of Sections entities
        Throws:
        EventAdminException - when there are no sections for given event

      • invitePlayerToEvents

        public void invitePlayerToEvents(Player player)
                          throws Exception
        Invites the Player entity given to events related to his/hers section.
        Parameters:
        player - - a Player entity
        Throws:
        Exception - when the process fails

      • getParticipationMap

        public HashMap<Events,ParticipantState> getParticipationMap(Users user,
                                                            List<Events> events)
        Creates a participatioin hash map of the ParticipantState for given user and events.
        Parameters:
        user - - an Users entity
        events - - a List of Events entities
        Returns:
        a HashMap where Events entity is the key and ParticipationState is the value

      • updateParticipation

        public void updateParticipation(Events event,
                                ParticipantState state,
                                String message)
        Updates participation of active user for given event, state and message.
        Parameters:
        event - - a Events entity
        state - - a ParticipantState enum value
        message - - a String message connected to the participation (mainly the reason why the player is not coming)
